JsonPath evaluator with Webassembly via Rust

JsonPath (click to try)
$.store.book[*].author
$..author
$.store.*
$.store..price
$..book[2]
$..book[-2]
$..book[0,1]
$..book[:2]
$..book[1:2]
$..book[-2:]
$..book[2:]
$..book[?(@.isbn)]
$.store.book[?(@.price < 10)]
$..*
$..book[ ?( (@.price < 13 || $.store.bicycle.price < @.price) && @.price <=10 ) ]
